text: Gilda Susan Radner (June 28, 1946 - May 20, 1989) was an American actress and comedian. She was born in Detroit, Michigan. She was one of the original cast members of NBC's comedy program Saturday Night Live (for which she won an Emmy Award in 1978). She died from ovarian cancer in Los Angeles, California. She was married to actor Gene Wilder before her death. == Other websites == * Category:1946 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Actors from Detroit Category:Comedians from Detroit Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American television writers Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:Emmy Award winners Category:Writers from Detroit people with anorexia nervosa
title: Gilda Radner
